attribs.name: repeating_feat-skill_-NNjLe1M9j2WeWj6goQh_feat_skill_notes
attribs.current:
You can apply natural cures to heal your allies. You can use Nature instead of Medicine to Treat Wounds. If youre in the wilderness, you might have easier access to fresh ingredients, allowing you to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your check to Treat Wounds using Nature, subject to the GMs determination.

[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Feats.aspx?ID=815)

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NNjNkc3Aa9wmdTrKNY8_traits
attribs.current: Emotion, Enchantment, Healing, Mental, Psyche, Psychic

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NNjNkc3Aa9wmdTrKNY8_description
attribs.current:
Your unleashed psyche gives you closer connections to the emotions of your allies, letting you project reassurance and strength that replenishes their mind and body. Choose one of the two benefits to grant one ally within 30 feet that you can see. That ally is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

* The ally gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects until your psyche ends.
* The ally regains Hit Points equal to 2 + double your level.

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NNjOg2GraqdpDtgk2NT_requirements
attribs.current: You're in an encounter, you Cast a Spell on your previous turn, and you aren't stupefied.

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NNjOg2GraqdpDtgk2NT_description
attribs.current:
You call on the depths of your mind and let psychic power flood through. Your Psyche remains Unleashed for 2 rounds or until you fall unconscious, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily quell your unleashed psyche. While your Psyche is Unleashed, the following effects occur.

* You're constantly surrounded by the visual manifestation of your psychic magic.

* When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's level. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.

* You can use **Restore the Mind**

After your unleashed psyche subsides, your mind must recover from the strain of channeling its full power. You can't use Unleash Psyche again for 2 rounds, and you're stupefied 1 for 2 rounds.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjOTkrs6848e-fQ4cT_description
attribs.current:
You can daze from a great distance. The range increases to 120 feet.  [*(from conscious mind)*](https://2e.aonprd.com/ConsciousMinds.aspx?ID=4)

You attack the target's with a mental jolt that deals damage equal to your Charisma modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save.

  If the target critically fails the save, it is also stunned 1.
**Level @{level} damage:  [[floor((@{cantrip_level}-1) /2)]]d6+@{charisma_modifier}**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=61)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjQ-828fWgK2WTKx8w_range
attribs.current: 120 feet, doesn't need line of effect

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjQ-828fWgK2WTKx8w_description
attribs.current:
Your message  can travel up to 120 feet to reach the target, bending around walls and obstacles; this means you don't need a straight line of effect or line of sight to cast message as long as you know the target's space and there is an unblocked path of 120 feet or less that can reach them.    [*(from conscious mind)*](https://2e.aonprd.com/ConsciousMinds.aspx?ID=4)

You mouth words quietly, but instead of coming out of your mouth, they're transferred directly to the ears of the target. While others can't hear your words any better than if you normally mouthed them, the target can hear your words as if they were standing next to you. 

The target can give a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action on their next turn if they wish, but they must be able to see you and be within range to do so. If they respond, their response is delivered directly to your ear, just like the original message.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=190)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjQ-828fWgK2WTKx8w_heightened
attribs.current: (3rd) The spell's range increases to 500 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjQr2wJ6i5bI5seGqk_description
attribs.current:
Choose an action you know the creature to have (such as Strike, Stride, or Breath Weapon). If the creature attempts that action on its next turn, it will  take 1d6 mental damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier (with a basic Will save). 

The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**Level @{level} damage:@{cantrip_level}d6+@{charisma_modifier} mental**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=1139)

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NNjPA7psc1utcWYcmWV_description
attribs.current:
You link your mind to the target's mind and mentally impart to that target an amount of information in an instant that could otherwise be communicated in 10 minutes.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=195)

attribs.name: repeating_senses_-NNjTaGnMz9yKx8JQcDa_sense_notes
attribs.current: You can see in dim light as though it were bright light, so you ignore the concealed condition due to dim light.

attribs.name: repeating_feat-ancestry_-NNjUNZiCB8I19cxVreZ_feat_ancestry_notes
attribs.current: Your muscles are tightly honed. Your Speed increases by 5 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjRtbN4ePpcDxfgaBc_target
attribs.current: 1 object of 1 Bulk or less, either unattended or possessed by you or a willing ally

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjRtbN4ePpcDxfgaBc_description
attribs.current:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=171)

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NNjRmdUtfzwyWWheW97_description
attribs.current:
Your target attempts a Will save   with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell.  If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

**Incapacitation**: If the target is  more than  twice the level of the spell, treat the  result of their check  as one degree of success better.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjRpCXgaCxDCM0QnKl_description
attribs.current:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the [``Raise a Shield``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Actions.aspx?ID=98) action, giving you a **+1 circumstance bonus to AC** until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the [``Shield Block``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. 

Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the magic missile spell.
**Level @{level} Shield Hardness:  [[floor((@{cantrip_level}) /2) *5]]**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=280)

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NO8i7YrVDEY4YNbPMe3_description
attribs.current:
**[``Amp``](https://2e.aonprd.com/ConsciousMinds.aspx?ID=4)**: Your telepathic push is particularly shocking to those who resist it. If the target fails its save, it's also  stunned 1.

Choose an action you know the creature to have (such as Strike, Stride, or Breath Weapon). If the creature attempts that action on its next turn, it will  take 1d6 mental damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier (with a basic Will save). 

The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**Level @{level} damage:@{cantrip_level}d6+@{charisma_modifier} mental**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=1139)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-class_-NO8luTtS9OAqwPekluP_feat_class_notes
attribs.current:
All psychics alter some of the standard spell components when casting spells.       Your psychic spells use Emotion instead of verbal components and Somatic guestures instead of material components.    Using Emotion components also   imparts the Concentrate trait to the spell.


SUBCONSCIOUS MIND - Emotional Acceptance

   Key Ability:  Charisma.
Psyche Action: Restore the Mind

The mind's truths come not in learned words or mathematical formulas but in deeper feelings and sensations. Emotions unlock the door to your poweryou might consider your heart the source of your strength, or you might find that the infinite complexity felt in a moment expresses your power more efficiently than any string of mystic words ever could.

 Your thought components are emotions. You might summon the sense of freedom to buoy you through the air or let fear grip your heart even as you plant it in another's mind. Emotion components tend to impart abstract or vivid effects to your visual and auditory spell manifestations as well as more intangible flashes of emotion, such as swirls of joyous color or a sense of growing melancholy.



CONSCIOUS MIND: The Silent Whisper

Every mind murmurs constantly, and the static from those nearby reverberates in your head like wind through leaves. What better focus for your magic then, than the very thoughts of those around you? Your versatile telepathic abilities let you soothe and communicate with your allies or control your enemies.

Standard Psi Cantrips: Daze, Message
Unique Psi Cantrips:  Forbidden Thought, Shatter Mind, Contagious Idea

BONUS SPELLS
1st: mindlink; 2nd: touch of idiocy; 3rd: heroism; 4th: telepathy; 5th: synaptic pulse, sending; 7th: visions of danger; 8th: uncontrollable dance; 9th: telepathic demand

attribs.name: repeating_feat-class_-NO8sNCm4txZnZHDzaPl_feat_class_notes
attribs.current:
You call on the depths of your mind and let psychic power flood through. Your Psyche remains Unleashed for 2 rounds or until your fall unconscious, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily quell your unleashed psyche. While your Psyche is Unleashed, the following effects occur:

-     You're constantly surrounded by the visual manifestation of your psychic magic.

    - When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's level. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.
    
- You can use actions that have the psyche trait. 

After your unleashed psyche subsides, your mind must recover from the strain of channeling its full power. You can't use Unleash Psyche again for 2 rounds, and you're stupefied 1 for 2 rounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NO8pC7AtMpQ9n6MKbM5_description
attribs.current:
[``Amp``](https://2e.aonprd.com/ConsciousMinds.aspx?ID=4): The damage of your daze spell increases to 1d10.  On a failed save, the target gains weakness 1 to mental damage and takes a 1 status penalty to Will saves. On a critical failure, the weakness is 3.

The weakness is applied before the damage from this attack is calculated.
**Level @{level} damage:  [[floor((@{cantrip_level}-1) /2)+1]]d10**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=61)

attribs.name: repeating_ranged-strikes_-no90ovpfzav6ztej0fo_weapon_notes
attribs.current: This weapon is a fully functional, lavish ink pen with a clip that can be attached to a pocket or bandoleer and easily retrieved as a free action. Using an action to Interact with the pen allows its wielder to disengage a stiletto blade that slides free of the upper body or reattach the previously removed blade.

attribs.name: repeating_melee-strikes_-NNjKoa4C34W1YQkLKm8_weapon_notes
attribs.current: This weapon is a fully functional, lavish ink pen with a clip that can be attached to a pocket or bandoleer and easily retrieved as a free action. Using an action to Interact with the pen allows its wielder to disengage a stiletto blade that slides free of the upper body or reattach the previously removed blade.

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NO93RtjYi8RIkhCNag2_requirements
attribs.current: You are holding or wearing healer's tools and have a hand free

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NO93RtjYi8RIkhCNag2_description
attribs.current:
You spend 10 minutes treating an injured living creature (including yourself). The target is then temporarily immune to Treat Wounds actions for 1 hour.

Make a DC 15 **Nature** *(see below)* Check.  On a success, heal 2d8 points.  On a Critical Success, heal 4d8.

Expert, Master, and Legendary practitioners of Medicine may choose to raise the difficulty of the check in order to heal more damage.

Expert: DC 20, heal an additional 10 hp
Master: DC 30, heal an additional 30 hp
Legendary: DC 40, heal an additional 50 hp


**Natural Medicine**:  You can apply natural cures to heal your allies. You can use Nature instead of Medicine to Treat Wounds. If youre in the wilderness, you might have easier access to fresh ingredients, allowing you to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your check to Treat Wounds using Nature, subject to the GMs determination.

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NO96-y8YP6ArfkWZm1V_trigger
attribs.current: While you have your shield raised--including the spell Shield--you would take damage from a physical attack.

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NO96-y8YP6ArfkWZm1V_description
attribs.current: You snap your shield in place to ward off a blow. Your shield prevents you from taking an amount of damage up to the shields Hardness. You and the shield each take any remaining damage, possibly breaking or destroying the shield.

attribs.name: repeating_actions_-NODwEwdmMb8K9SDtUCf_description
attribs.current:
Choose a creature within 30 feet of you who you're aware of. Attempt an Intimidation check against that target's Will DC. If the target does not understand the language you are speaking, or you're not speaking a language, you take a 4 circumstance penalty to the check. Regardless of your result, the target is temporarily immune to your attempts to Demoralize it for 10 minutes.

Critical Success The target becomes frightened 2.
Success The target becomes frightened 1.

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NR1eDwktMBian05ZQhF_range
attribs.current: 120 feet, doesn't need line of effect

attribs.name: repeating_spellfocus_-NR1eDwktMBian05ZQhF_description
attribs.current:
[``Amp``](https://2e.aonprd.com/ConsciousMinds.aspx?ID=4):  Your telepathic message allows you to coordinate your actions while you pass on information. **The target can immediately spend its reaction to Step or Stride.**

Your message is not so easily bound by obstacles. The spell can travel up to 120 feet to reach the target, bending around walls and obstacles; this means you don't need a straight line of effect or line of sight to cast message as long as you know the target's space and there is an unblocked path of 120 feet or less that can reach them.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=190)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-class_-nqcxjfmyltsoa0nj3cr_feat_class_notes
attribs.current:
You can create remedies and other herbal products. You gain the [``basic alchemy benefits``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Rules.aspx?ID=1435), though they apply only for herbal items: alchemical items with the healing trait, plus antidote and antiplague.

You gain batches of infused reagents per day equal to your level or half your level if you didn't make your daily preparations in the wilderness. Your advanced alchemy level for creating these is 1 and doesn't increase on its own. 

You become an expert in Nature and can use Nature instead of Crafting to Craft herbal items.

You don't need to be trained in Crafting or have the Alchemical Crafting feat to do so, and you can use healer's tools instead of alchemist's tools.


[**Advanced Alchemy**](https://2e.aonprd.com/Classes.aspx?ID=1) (level 1)



[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Feats.aspx?ID=1982)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-bonus_-NRB4-qRP1V7RPDQ6a2z_feat_bonus_notes
attribs.current:
*(from [Herbalist Dedication](https://2e.aonprd.com/Feats.aspx?ID=1982))*

You can use the [``Craft``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Skills.aspx?ID=4) activity to create alchemical items. When you select this feat, you immediately add the formulas for four common 1st-level alchemical items to your formula book. 

Formulas chosen:
- Lesser Antidote
- Lesser Antiplague
-  Minor Elixir of Life
- Minor Vaccine

[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Feats.aspx?ID=752)

attribs.name: repeating_elixirs_-NRB5x2ClJwWD3mbdrZI_description
attribs.current:
A minor elixir of life **heals 1d6 hit points** and grants a **+1 item bonus vs disease and poison**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Equipment.aspx?ID=91)

attribs.name: repeating_elixirs_-NRB7hJqhg0uCll9cgzA_description
attribs.current:
**Special**:  Creating a vaccine requires a sample of the disease

A minor vaccine grants a creature **immunity to a specific strain of disease** of level 1 or lower, and a **+2 item bonus on all saving throws against other strains** of the same disease.  
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Equipment.aspx?ID=1969)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NRBM3YGcZFXXZsaA5vj_description
attribs.current:
An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. You deal electricity damage equal to 1d4 plus your Wisdom modifier.
**Level @{level} damage:@{cantrip_level}d4+@{wisdom_modifier} electric**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=97)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NRBQPdwPTfidDlYtAkf_description
attribs.current:
Water blasts upward, coming out of the ground, rising from a pool, or even manifesting from thin air. Any creatures in the area take bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your Wisdom modifier (with a basic Reflex saving throw).

You can change this spell's area to a 5-foot burst, provided you center the burst in a body of water. This body of water can be as small as a pond or creek, but not as small as a puddle or bathtub.
**Level @{level} damage:@{cantrip_level}d4+@{wisdom_modifier} bludgeoning**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=1002)

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NWKl9-thFVO7OPJe1Xh_cast_detail_information
attribs.current: You Cast a Spell on the previous turn and you aren't stupedfied

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NWKl9-thFVO7OPJe1Xh_description
attribs.current:
For the duration of this effect, your damaging psychic spells **deal extra damage equal to double the spell's level**.  This doesn't apply to spells with a duration. 

You can also use the **Restore the Mind** action at will.

After 2 rounds, your Unleashed Psyche subsides and you become [``stupefied 1``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 2 rounds.  

You cannot Unleash Psyche again for 2 rounds. 
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Actions.aspx?ID=1222)

attribs.name: repeating_spellinnate_-NWKw0UsLwjW11LFGdep_description
attribs.current:
Grant your ally one of the following benefits:

            +1 vs mental effects
            Heal [[@{level}*2+2]]hit points

After receiving this benefit, your ally is immune to Restore the Mind for 10 minutes.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Actions.aspx?ID=1223)

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NWKyGaMARdehlAZXcid_description
attribs.current:
Each creature in the area becomes drowsy and might fall asleep. A creature that falls unconscious from this spell doesn't fall prone or release what it's holding. This spell doesn't prevent creatures from waking up due to a successful Perception check, limiting its utility in combat.

**Incapacitation**: If the target is  more than  twice the level of the spell, treat the  result of their check  as one degree of success better.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NWKyGaMARdehlAZXcid_heightened
attribs.current: (4th) The creatures fall unconscious for 1 round on a failure or 1 minute on a critical failure. They fall prone and release what they're holding, and they can't attempt Perception checks to wake up. When the duration ends, the creature is sleeping normally instead of automatically waking up.

You dull the target's mind; the target must attempt a Will save.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NNjRpCXgaCxDCM0QnKl_duration
attribs.current: until the start of your next turn

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPSx48O6uNOB4fMxbt_description
attribs.current:
You lance the target with energy. You deal positive energy damage equal to 1d6 plus your Wisdom modifier.  The target must attempt a basic Fortitude save. If the creature critically fails the save, it is also enfeebled 1 for 1 round.
**Level @{level} damage:@{cantrip_level}d6+@{wisdom_modifier} positive**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=79)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPU4uZNC8wGVCd2saO_description
attribs.current:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the level of your read aura spell.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPV4NICYxFF7RY4Pcx_description
attribs.current:
You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a **+1 status bonus** to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=142)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPV4NICYxFF7RY4Pcx_duration
attribs.current: until the start of your next turn

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPVjymgnxOU50IbaSv_target
attribs.current: a handful of dirt or mud

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPVjymgnxOU50IbaSv_description
attribs.current:
You purify some dirt or mud into a pliable, claylike plaster that can aid in clotting and healing. This restorative substance can be used in lieu of healer's tools for Medicine checks to Administer First Aid or Treat Wounds. If the plaster isn't used within the spell's duration, or if you Cast the Spell again before using the plaster, it reverts to being normal non-magical earth. 
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=925)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPVjymgnxOU50IbaSv_heightened
attribs.current: (3rd) The plaster grants anyone using it to Administer First Aid or Treat Wounds a +1 item bonus to the Medicine check.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPW3ZbxKP5OoIcg5vR_description
attribs.current:
You splash a glob of acid that splatters your target and nearby creatures. Make a spell attack. If you hit, you deal **1d6 acid damage** plus **1 splash acid damage**. 
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=3)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPW3ZbxKP5OoIcg5vR_save_critical_success
attribs.current: On a critical success, the target also takes 1 [``persistent``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) acid damage.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPXnbcsPEyLrGI4GOZ_description
attribs.current:
You exhale a shimmering cloud of toxic breath at an enemy's face. The target takes **@{wisdom_modifier} poison damage**  and **2 [``persistent``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) poison damage**


**Level @{level} damage:@{cantrip_level}d4+@{wisdom_modifier} **

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPXnbcsPEyLrGI4GOZ_heightened
attribs.current: (+2) The initial poison damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent poison damage increases by 1.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPYl7CHzJ6wm0yKi1W_description
attribs.current:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the level of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=66)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPZDogmZaXeZKBMrtE_heightened
attribs.current: (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4 and the persistent damage on a critical hit by 1d4.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPaOeJlsS4ZDZ-KbJG_description
attribs.current:
You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 1d4+@{wisdom_modifier} cold damage.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=245)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPaOeJlsS4ZDZ-KbJG_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target also takes a -10 foot status penalty to its speeds for 1 round

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPb545ZAGMdiAhv8z0_description
attribs.current:
You evoke a jumble of rocks in the area. The scattering rocks deal **1d4+@{wisdom_modifier} bludgeoning damage** to creatures in the area, with a basic Reflex save. The ground in the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. A creature can Interact to clear a square of this scree.

If you cast this spell again, any previous scatter scree you have cast ends.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=990)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPbgrzXpHqMXnGFLZP_save_success
attribs.current: The target takes a 10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPbgrzXpHqMXnGFLZP_heightened
attribs.current:
(2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.
(4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NWPbgrzXpHqMXnGFLZP_description
attribs.current:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=330)

attribs.name: perception_notes
attribs.current:
You can use the Seek action to sense undetected creatures in a 60-foot cone (instead of the normal 30-foot cone).

You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to locate undetected creatures that you could hear within 30 feet with a Seek action.    *([Whisper Elf](https://2e.aonprd.com/Heritages.aspx?ID=9))*

attribs.name: repeating_feat-ancestry_-NWo4aChy6K-PbwORQZn_feat_ancestry_notes
attribs.current:
Your ears are finely tuned, able to detect even the slightest whispers of sound. As long as you can hear normally, you can use the Seek action to sense undetected creatures in a 60-foot cone instead of a 30-foot cone. 

You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to locate undetected creatures that you could hear within 30 feet with a Seek action.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Heritages.aspx?Ancestry=2)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-bonus_-NWo5JUYbZ3vgdRWUD1k_feat_bonus_notes
attribs.current:
*(from [Root Worker](https://2e.aonprd.com/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=175) background)*

During your daily preparations, you can assemble a small pouch with bits of herbs, hair, sacred oils, and other ritual ingredients, which you give to one ally. 

The first time that day the ally attempts a **saving throw against a spell or haunt, they gain a +1 circumstance bonus** to the roll.

This bonus increases to +2 if you're an expert in Occultism or +3 if you're legendary.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Feats.aspx?ID=2147)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-class_-NWo6d772vbiknnqYCtr_feat_class_notes
attribs.current:
You cast spells like a druid. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity. You can prepare two common cantrips each day from the primal spell list in this book or any other primal cantrips you learn or discover. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for primal spells. Your key spellcasting ability for druid archetype spells is Wisdom, and they are primal druid spells.

You learn the Druidic language, and you are bound by the druid's anathema.

Choose a druidic order. You become a member of that order and are also bound by its specific anathema, allowing you to take the order's feats. You become trained in Nature and your order's associated skill; for each of these skills in which you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of order.

[**Druid Anathema**](https://2e.aonprd.com/Classes.aspx?ID=6):
- using metal armor or shields
- despoiling natural places
- teaching the Druidic language to non-druids

[**Leaf Order Anathema**](https://2e.aonprd.com/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=2):    Committing wanton cruelty to plants or fungi or killing plants unnecessarily is anathema to your order. (This doesnt prevent you from defending yourself against plants or fungi or harvesting them when necessary for survival.)
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Feats.aspx?ID=701)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-class_-nqcxjfmyltsoa0nj3cr_feat_class_prerequisites
attribs.current: trained in Nature;  Natural Medicine feat

attribs.name: repeating_feat-general_-NU-rFBa1G4106IAXLRk_feat_general_notes
attribs.current:
When you Treat Wounds, your patient becomes immune for only 10 minutes instead of 1 hour. This applies only to your Treat Wounds activities, not any other the patient receives.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Feats.aspx?ID=771)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-class_-NWoFA5NNLilnREarGDX_feat_class_notes
attribs.current:
For each spell level you have access to, choose one spell of that level to be a signature spell.

You don't need to learn heightened versions of signature spells separately; instead, you can heighten these spells freely. If you've learned a signature spell at a higher level than its minimum, you can also cast all its lower-level versions without learning those separately. If you swap out a signature spell, you can choose a replacement signature spell of the same spell level at which you learned the previous spell. You can also retrain specifically to change a signature spell to a different spell of that level without swapping any spells; this takes as much time as retraining a spell normally does.
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Classes.aspx?ID=21)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-class_-NYVdwtaZBfj61CO7zUu_feat_class_notes
attribs.current: Add two additional cantrips from your spell list to your repertoire.

attribs.name: repeating_feat-class_-NYVdsKSmXR1BqBVRTne_feat_class_notes
attribs.current: Usually gained at 4th level, these feats grant a 1st-level spell slot. At 6th level, they grant you a 2nd-level spell slot, and if you have a spell repertoire, you can select one spell from your repertoire as a signature spell. At 8th level, they grant you a 3rd-level spell slot. Archetypes refer to these benefits as the "basic spellcasting benefits"

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NYVe3lfnqT9XEvR66YC_description
attribs.current: You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damageas appropriate for the object you hurledequal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-NYVesJdRXo3PINY-V6R_description
attribs.current:
As you make comforting sounds and gestures, you approach the target in a friendly manner combining caution and confidence. You improve the target's attitude to you by one step (unfriendly to neutral, neutral to friendly, friendly to helpful) for the duration of the spell unless it succeeds at a Will save. Afterward, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day.

This spell works on only domesticated animals; for example, you could use it on guard dogs or stray dogs, but not feral dogs or wolves. If the socialization of the animal is in question, the decision is up to the GM.

attribs.name: diplomacy_notes
attribs.current: +1 bonus is from Crown of the Companion

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-nc0ay7q5yb3gpleymfp_save_critical_success
attribs.current: The target takes double damage and [[@{cantrip_level]+1] [``persistent bleed damage``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

attribs.name: repeating_feat-skill_-Nc0Db2ebJfrA3P5ZYUV_feat_skill_notes
attribs.current: You can use Deception to weave traps to trip up anyone trying to deceive you. If you can engage in conversation with someone trying to Lie to you, use your Deception DC if it is higher than your Perception DC to determine whether they succeed. This doesnt apply if you dont have a back-and-forth dialogue, such as when someone attempts to Lie during a long speech.

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-nc0ay7q5yb3gpleymfp_description
attribs.current:
You shape three needles out of a piece of metal in your possession and send them flying in a tight group toward one target.

The needles impart any special properties of the metal that forms them; for instance, cold iron needles deal additional damage to creatures with weakness to cold iron. All the needles are made of the same metal, and the metal returns to you after the attack.

You deal electricity damage equal to 1d4 plus your Wisdom modifier.
**Level @{level} damage:[[@{cantrip_level}+2]]d4 piercing**
[``PRD``](https://2e.aonprd.com/Spells.aspx?ID=1375)

attribs.name: repeating_cantrip_-nc0ay7q5yb3gpleymfp_heightened
attribs.current: (+1) You send one additional needle, increasing the regular damage by 1d4 and increasing the persistent bleed damage on a critical hit by 1.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NdhR-ZJHzAed2CUeiNW_description
attribs.current: You tap into the target's inner heroism, granting it a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

attribs.name: repeating_normalspells_-NdhR-ZJHzAed2CUeiNW_heightened
attribs.current:
Heightened (6th) The status bonus increases to +2.
Heightened (9th) The status bonus increases to +3.

trying to fool someone or lie
create diversion

attribs.name: repeating_items-readied_-NhdlMyaB7LCWAACwNu0_readied_misc
attribs.current: Weapons made from cold iron are deadly to demons and fey alike. Cold iron looks like normal iron but is mined from particularly pure sources and shaped with little or no heat. This process is extremely difficult, especially for high-grade cold iron items.

abilities.name: Treat-Wounds
